body:
@McClunatic and I are unable to install gcc 8.1.0 with the binutils variant enabled.

### Expected Result

I expected gcc@8.1.0 to install correctly.

### Actual Result

I get an error about CONSTEXPR.  Build log is attached.  Please let me know if any other information would be helpful.
```
/home/klinvex/spack/var/spack/stage/gcc-8.1.0-4jyrud5wgzrae5oiu7pzynhhzmcrvc7g/gcc-8.1.0/gcc/vec.h:531:3: error: ‘CONSTEXPR’ does not name a type
```
[spack-build.env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/2247504/spack-build.env.txt)
[spack-build.out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/2247512/spack-build.out.txt)

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install gcc@8.1.0+binutils%gcc@4.8.5
```

### Information on your system

Centos7, x86_64
title: gcc@8.1.0 +binutils does not install correctly
